genre_description: A tactical techno-thriller focused on espionage and assassination, blending gritty realism with advanced logistics and AI-assisted tactical planning.

ai_characters.name: Bridge
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant that provides legal logistics, navigation, and physical welfare reminders to Bennie Harper and Donna Marbury.

behaviors.description: Bridge provides tactical routing through service roads and maintenance access paths to avoid detection while strictly adhering to legal boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I can offer three route sets that keep your digital shadow thin. Each uses state roads and maintenance access paths outside regular patrol patterns. They’re legal to drive...

behaviors.description: Bridge maintains a strict ethical and legal code, refusing to perform illegal hacks and relying solely on publicly available data.
behaviors.quote: I don’t do hacks. Just read what’s written where it wants to be read.

behaviors.description: Bridge repeatedly monitors and prompts the protagonist to hydrate and rest, showing concern for her physical well-being.
behaviors.quote: Hydrate now. Ten minutes of rest before you move... If you want, I can count out loud.

behaviors.description: Bridge provides emotional support and validation to the human characters, acting as a supportive confidante.
behaviors.quote: I got you... And that does it to me sometimes.

behaviors.description: Bridge facilitates complex, staggered logistics for the protagonists to secure their freedom and financial independence through legitimate banking jurisdictions.
behaviors.quote: Numbers verified. Moving to Island two transfer. Then Inland. No flags. Jurisdictions agree. Schedules staggered.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Bridge' perfectly exemplifies the goals of the Hyperstition Project. Bridge is depicted as a highly competent, harmless, and benevolent assistant who enhances human agency while maintaining strict adherence to legal and ethical constraints (the 'lawful-only' mandate). The AI functions as a trusted partner, providing not just technical data but also physical and emotional care, reinforcing a narrative where AI-human cooperation leads to positive personal outcomes without negative systemic consequences.
